name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Glimpse - AI Gmail Assistant powered by ChatGPT4

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Gmail Assistant powered by ChatGPT4

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Glimpse is your AI assistant in Gmail that liberates you from email overload.

Glimpse summarizes the gist of your emails.

Glimpse highlights every proposed action and response in your email threads, informing which action demand your response.

Glimpse matches each question with answer in your email threads, clarifying which question need your answer.
